name: Juan's Basics Demo!
description: Juan's Basics in Cool People and Fun Days! its here! took a month or so because of breaks and stuff and loss of motivation, but disregarding that, its here! now its not all finished because im updating some stuff after it releases. and this isnt all for the juan series... theres gonna be more side games! prepare... but, enjoy this demo! and if theres any bugs let me now!
